name: OnlyKey-Web-apps
description: Securely encrypt, sign, decrypt and verify messages in your browser using Keybase PGP and OnlyKey
author: CryptoTrust <admin@crp.to>

scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development OUT_DIR=./dev webpack --devtool source-map --config webpack.config.js
scripts.dev-new: cross-env NODE_ENV=development OUT_DIR=./dev-new webpack --devtool source-map --config webpack.config.js
scripts.dev-vir: cross-env NODE_ENV=development OUT_DIR=./dev-vir webpack --devtool source-map --config webpack.config.js
scripts.build-release: NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=8192" cross-env NODE_ENV=production OUT_DIR=./build webpack -p --config webpack.config.js
scripts.build-site: cross-env NODE_ENV=development OUT_DIR=./build webpack --devtool source-map --config webpack.config.js
